00008 #ifndef _COMPARABLE_H
00009 #define _COMPARABLE_H
00010 
00011 #include "Object.h"
00012 
00013 SYLPH_START_NAMESPACE(Core)
00014 SYLPH_PUBLIC
00015 template<class T, class V>
00016 inline bool operator!=(const T& lhs, const V& rhs) {
00017     return !(lhs == rhs);
00018 }
00019 
00020 template<class T, class V>
00021 inline bool operator>(const T& lhs, const V& rhs) {
00022     return !(lhs < rhs) && !(*lhs == rhs);
00023 }
00024 
00025 template<class T, class V>
00026 inline bool operator<=(const T& lhs, const V& rhs) {
00027     return (lhs < rhs) || (lhs == rhs);
00028 }
00029 
00030 template<class T, class V>
00031 inline bool operator>=(const T& lhs, const V& rhs) {
00032     return !(lhs < rhs);
00033 }
00034 SYLPH_END_NAMESPACE(Core)
00035 
00036 #endif  /* _COMPARABLE_H */
